mapper.insert: insert into tw213_shipment_location_detail_history (warehouse_cd, client_id, shipment_plan_id, product_id, location_id, status, product_plan_cnt, inventory_cnt, reserve_cnt, biko, ins_usr, ins_date, upd_usr, upd_date, del_flg) values (#{warehouse_cd},#{client_id},#{shipment_plan_id},#{product_id},#{location_id},#{status}, #{product_plan_cnt},#{inventory_cnt},#{reserve_cnt},#{biko},#{ins_usr},#{ins_date},#{upd_usr},#{upd_date},0)
